document_data.name: Rockgrit
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|3}}
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|19}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Rockgrit''' was a strong [[gnome|gnomish]] pale [[ale]] from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Description: Rockgrit a highly-alcoholic ale, on par with hard liquor, that was distilled from [[potato]]es. It was sometimes served with two highsunfeasts – [[Brick]], or [[Rosto]].
document_data.History: Stint was a staple of a gnomish out-of-the way café in Ravens Bluff called [[Le PoTeete Café]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It served only gnomish pale ales, with [[Greentart]] and [[Stint]] being only alternatives.
